title: Bug 15899 - Close All Saved does not work consistently
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu sometimes fails to close all the saved files.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' option should consistently close all the saved files, especially when no changes have been made to them.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open multiple files in the editor.
3. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt).
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the 'File' menu.
